channel.title: Game of Life on Ramblings of a build engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Game of Life on Ramblings of a build engineer

item.title: TDD and Game of Life
item.description: So today at 8-12PM I had a great session with two friends of mine. It was awesome. Like a mini code retreat. We set down in a musky bar, drank wine and beer and cider, and decided to practice some TDD with the well known problem of Conway’s Game of Life. This challenge is really interesting. I never done it before, ever. So it was a really good practice for me.
